mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TOPENCLOSE WHERE CLOSE_MONEY IS NULL AND STORE_NO = #{storeNo}
SELECT B.USER_ID AS CLOSER_ID , B.USER_NAME AS CLOSER_NAME , A.MODIFY_DATE FROM TOPENCLOSE A , TUSER B WHERE A.MODIFY_ID = B.USER_ID AND A.STORE_NO = #{storeNo} ORDER BY A.MODIFY_DATE DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT OC.OPEN_CLOSE_SEQ FROM TOPENCLOSE OC WHERE CLOSE_MONEY IS NOT NULL AND date_format(OC.INSERT_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') = curdate() AND OC.STORE_NO = #{storeNo} ORDER BY OC.OPEN_CLOSE_SEQ DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT OPEN_CLOSE_NO FROM TOPENCLOSE WHERE STORE_NO = #{storeNo} ORDER BY OPEN_CLOSE_NO DESC LIMIT 1
